name: DISCONTINUED Google Docs Sepia Dark Theme
description:
A fix for the recent update on google docs that broke every single other dark theme here. Makes everything on google docs black and sepia.

PLEASE USE THE UPDATED STYLE:
https://userstyles.org/styles/176661/updated-google-docs-sepia-dark-theme-v2-2-1

discussions.name: High lighting from search doesn't work?
Let me know if theres any changes needed!
